alert.note: Alert for Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area; Glacier Bay; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area; Southern Inner Channels (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued June 28 at 2:23PM AKDT until June 29 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 10 AM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Gustavus, Elfin Cove, Klawock, Craig, Ketchikan, and Metlakatla. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 10 AM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of fog will move back into the outer coast through Tuesday night, extending across Icy Strait and up Clarence Strait. Similar to early Tuesday morning, the marine fog and low clouds will lift or back off the coast through mid morning Wednesday.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area; Glacier Bay; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area; Southern Inner Channels
